subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 42 points but the Knicks lost a late lead in Boston for the second straight game. The Knicks are down 2-0 in the series as it heads back to New York on Friday.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 42 points but the Knicks lost a late lead in Boston for the second straight game. The Knicks are down 2-0 in the series as it heads back to New York on Friday.
